title: The Intruder in the Field
location: Agricultural Zone -> The Northern Livestock Pens
description: Something has been raiding the northern livestock pens nightly — not stealing the animals, but eating only specific parts and leaving the rest. Three goats and a pig have been found in this state. Farmer Cord believes it may be a large Scourge-touched predator.

turns.narrative: The predator takes only organ meat — heart and liver — leaving everything else completely untouched. Tracker Selva crouches over a set of prints near the pen. They are large, six-toed, and show retractable claw marks — consistent with a large feline Scourge-variant, but the print pattern shows the animal is injured: its left rear foot drags slightly.
turns.choice_a: Follow the tracks immediately while they're fresh
turns.consequence_a: The tracks lead to a drainage culvert under the north wall where a large, emaciated creature has made a temporary den. It is clearly suffering.
turns.choice_b: Set a live trap baited with organ meat before following the tracks
turns.consequence_b: The trap works. By morning, you find the creature caught — a Scourge-feline, badly injured, unable to hunt normally.

turns.narrative: The creature is a Scourge-touched lynx variant, badly injured — likely from a trap or debris in the Fringe. It raided the pens out of desperation, unable to hunt wild prey. It is not threatening you directly but is clearly suffering.
turns.choice_a: Attempt to calm and treat the creature's injury
turns.consequence_a: A careful, tense interaction. The creature allows you to clean and bind the infected wound after you move very slowly.
turns.choice_b: Humanely put the creature down to end its suffering
turns.consequence_b: Selva agrees it is the responsible choice. She performs the action quickly. Farmer Cord is relieved.

turns.narrative: Cord wants his pens better protected going forward.
turns.choice_a: Help upgrade the pen fencing with reinforced stakes and motion-triggered noise makers
turns.consequence_a: The upgraded pens deter future intrusions effectively.
turns.choice_b: Recommend Cord apply to the Agricultural Zone for a Zone Guard patrol route that includes the north pens
turns.consequence_b: The Zone Guard agrees. Pens are added to the nightly patrol circuit.

creature_treated.description: Scourge-feline treated and released. Pens reinforced.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Scourge-feline treated and released. Pens reinforced.
